title: Legion Command
description: A web browser-based single-lane strategy game developed using Phaser 3.9, a 2D game framework. All core systems - including combat mechanics, unit/resource management, and permanent/rogue-lite upgrade loops - were coded from scratch using TypeScript.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A single-page website built using React and TypeScript to showcase my projects. Features Material UI (MUI) components and responsive design principles for excellent user experience across all devices.
